mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order (order_id, userid, post_code, street_address, address, detail_address, sum_price, payment_option) values (#{order_id}, #{userid}, #{post_code}, #{street_address}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{sum_price}, #{payment_option})

insert into TBL_ORDER_DETAILS (ORDER_DETAILS_NUM, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, amount, USERID) SELECT SEQ_ORDER_DETAILS.nextval, #{order_id}, PRODUCT_ID, amount, userid from TBL_CART where USERID = #{userid}
